column1: Power's not given to you. You have to take it. -Beyonce
Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage. -Anais Nin
My best successes came on the heels of failures. -Barbara Corcoran
The naked truth is always better than the best-dressed lie. -Ann Landers
I wouldn’t ask anyone to do anything I wouldn’t do myself. -Indra Nooyi
Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light. -Helen Keller
Even though the future seems far away
column2: it is actually beginning right now. -Mattie Stepanek

column3: pretty much really easy because I define myself. -Serena Williams

column1: Leadership should be more participative than directive
column2: more enabling than performing. -Mary D. Poole

column1: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness. -Oprah Winfrey
I learned to always take on things I’d never done before. Growth and comfort do not coexist. -Ginni Rometty
If we do not share our stories and shine a light on inequities
I wake up every morning and think to myself
column2: ‘How far can I push the company forward in the next 24 hours? -Leah Busque

column1: I did not have the most experience in the industry or the most money
column2: but I cared the most. -Sara Blakely
you have to believe in yourself or no one else will. -Sarah Michelle Gellar

column1: We treat our people like royalty. If you honor and serve the people who work for you
column2: they will honor and serve you. -Mary Kay Ash

column1: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful committed citizens can change the world. Indeed
column2: it is the only thing that ever has. -M Mead
